title: Swarm Learning-Based Distributed Collaborative Learning Design for Energy System Data Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of machine learning, overview of blockchain technology, and understanding of energy system data structures
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals in the energy sector with high demands for data security and privacy protection. Conducting time-divided microlearning in mobile environments using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners design distributed data modeling collaborations between two or more virtual organizations using swarm learning architecture
Learners implement a learning process that ensures the integrity and transparency of energy data by applying blockchain-based smart contracts
Learners develop a model that improves prediction accuracy by over 15% compared to existing learning methods using real-world energy time-series data (solar power generation/geothermal physics data)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
